meanings.definition: (Latin) to adhere to, cling to, stick to; to agree with, support
meanings.english_definition: (Latin) to adhere to, cling to, stick to; to agree with, support

examples.sentence: Si quis adhaeriscit Domino, unus spiritus est.
examples.translation: He who is joined to the Lord is one spirit with him.
